name: Ambrosia Resonance and the Fortress of Steel
name_original: Ambrosia Resonance and the Fortress of Steel
description:
A game about a psionic dragon named Ambrosia Resonance as she infiltrates a mechanical fortress to defeat an evil tyrant, the Iron Queen. As it is still in development, what you see here may be subject to change.

Artwork by Hushie (Tumblr: https://hushthelatesunart.tumblr.com/ and Twitter: https://twitter.com/hushthelatesun)
Music, sound effects, and some art by Isis E. Prosser ( https://lairofthestormdragon.com/ )
